sentence.Network_en: We don't live in the lap of luxury, but we're comfortable.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的生活虽然并非锦衣玉食，也算是衣食无忧。

sentence.Network_en: In warm weather, you should wear clothing that is cool and comfortable.
sentence.Network_cn: 在热天里，应该穿凉快舒适的衣服。

sentence.Network_en: Now sit down and make yourself comfortable. You must be very tired.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在坐下来，让自己舒服些，你一定很累了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'pleasant, pleasing'): from Anglo-Norman French confortable, from conforter 'to comfort' (see comfort)

entry.tran: (家具、衣服等)让人舒服的，舒适的
entry.def: If a piece of furniture or an item of clothing is comfortable, it makes you feel physically relaxed when you use it, for example because it is soft.

example.ex: Trainers are so comfortable to wear.

entry.tran: (建筑物或房间)令人放松的，安逸的，舒适的
entry.def: If a building or room is comfortable, it makes you feel physically relaxed when you spend time in it, for example because it is warm and has nice furniture.

example.ex: A home should be comfortable and friendly.
example.tran: 家应该让人觉得舒服、亲切。

entry.def: If you are comfortable, you are physically relaxed because of the place or position you are sitting or lying in.

example.ex: Lie down on your bed and make yourself comfortable...
She tried to maneuver her body into a more comfortable position.
example.tran: 她试着把身子挪了挪，换了一个较为舒服的姿势。

entry.def: If you say that someone is comfortable, you mean that they have enough money to be able to live without financial problems.

example.tran: “他很有钱吗？”“他生活挺宽裕的。”

example.ex: She came from a stable, comfortable, middle-class family.
example.tran: 她出身于一个收入稳定、生活宽裕的中产阶级家庭。

entry.def: In a race, competition, or election, if you have a comfortable lead, you are likely to win it easily. If you gain a comfortable victory or majority, you win easily.

example.ex: By half distance we held a comfortable two-lap lead...
example.tran: 到半程时，我们轻松领先两圈。

example.ex: He appeared to be heading for a comfortable victory.

entry.def: If you feel comfortable with a particular situation or person, you feel confident and relaxed with them.

example.ex: Nervous politicians might well feel more comfortable with a step-by-step approach...
example.tran: 神经脆弱的政治家们似乎更容易接受一种循序渐进的做法。

example.ex: He liked me and I felt comfortable with him...
example.tran: 他喜欢我，我跟他在一起觉得很自在。

entry.tran: (病人或受伤者)情况稳定的，状况良好的
entry.def: When a sick or injured person is said to be comfortable, they are in a stable physical condition.

example.ex: He was described as comfortable in hospital last night.
example.tran: 据说昨晚他在医院状况良好。

entry.tran: (生活、工作或所处的环境)轻松的，无忧无虑的
entry.def: A comfortable life, job, or situation does not cause you any problems or worries.

example.ex: ...a comfortable teaching job at a university...
example.tran: 在大学教书的轻松工作

example.ex: Kohl's retirement looks far from comfortable.
example.tran: 看来科尔的退休生活一点都不自在。

means.word_mean: 1. providing or experiencing physical well-being or relief (`comfy' is informal);

sentences.sentence: "the antihistamine made her feel more comfortable"

means.word_mean: 2. free from stress or conducive to mental ease; having or affording peace of mind;

sentences.sentence: "was settled in a comfortable job, one for which he was well prepared"
"the comfortable thought that nothing could go wrong"
"she's a comfortable person to be with"
"she felt comfortable with her fiance's parents"
"the home team had a comfortable lead"

means.word_mean: 5. in fortunate circumstances financially; moderately rich;

sentences.sentence: "they were comfortable or even wealthy by some standards"

auth_sentence.content: I'm from a boring, comfortable London suburb.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm from a boring, comfortable London suburb.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm from a boring, comfortable London suburb.

auth_sentence.content: I helped the Reading academy and was comfortable teaching.
auth_sentence.res_content: I helped the Reading academy and was comfortable teaching.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I helped the Reading academy and was comfortable teaching.

auth_sentence.content: Tottenham had two chances to enjoy a comfortable evening.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tottenham had two chances to enjoy a comfortable evening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tottenham had two chances to enjoy a comfortable evening.

Sentence.sentence: I'm not comfortable in any relationship where all I do is take
Em, I always serve the freshest possible food and I make the atmosphere as comfortable and as pleasant as I can, so that my customers will want to come back.
Only four out of the 54 people interviewed had completely broken with their sisters and brothers and only one of the four felt comfortable with the break.
He seemed relaxed to me, the type of person people feel comfortable with right away.

means.word_mean: 愉快放松的；舒服的；安逸的

sentences.en: Tom gratefully took in the comfortable sitting room.
sentences.cn: 汤姆感激地接受了那间舒适的起居室。

sentences.en: I feel comfortable talking with that nice girl.
sentences.cn: 和那个可爱的女孩谈话我感觉很好。

jushi.english: Tom gratefully took in the comfortable sitting room, with its little tables crowded with ornaments.
jushi.chinese: 汤姆感激地接受了那舒适的起居室,连带几张摆满了装饰品的小桌。

jushi.english: What you obviously need is a nice comfortable bed in a nice comfortable base hospital with a nice comfortable nurse to look after you?
jushi.chinese: 你到底需要什么,一张安逸、舒服的床,一家舒服的医院和一个让你觉得舒服的女护士照顾你?
